author: USA TODAY, Adrianna Rodiguez, Veronica Bravo and Janet Loehrke, USA TODAY
title: Is it safe to go grocery shopping? Helpful tips during the coronavirus pandemic
description: When are the best times to go? Should I wipe down groceries? Here's some safety advice during the COVID-19 pandemic.
content:
Businesses remain closed as the coronavirus spreads and more states issue stay-at-home orders in which residents are ordered to shelter in place except in limited circumstances.
One of those exceptions is going to the grocery store. Many supermarkets have im… [+8374 chars]
